name: AyAhuAskA
description:
With the help of the spirits, venture into the forest where the answers to all your questions lie. Take control over the elements, use their power to overcome the challenges in front of you and disclose the secrets of the forest.

Controls: 

WASD to move, SPACEBAR to jump, Q recall the elementals, E to switch between shaman and elementals

U/I/O/P to control AIR/EARTH/FIRE/WATER (hold down U/I/O/P to activate their power)

Leave a comment with advices and suggestions!
